keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Relatives mourned two Ethiopian migrants killed by militants in Libya who claimed ties to the Islamic State, a reminder of the dangers facing those seeking a better life.

headline.print_headline: Grief Mixes With Anger Over Ethiopian Deaths
headline.main: Grief Mixes With Anger Over Christian Ethiopian Deaths

snippet: Relatives mourned two Ethiopian migrants killed by militants in Libya who claimed ties to the Islamic State, a reminder of the dangers facing those seeking a better life.
abstract: Ethiopian families mourn two young migrants who were killed in Libya by militants claiming to be with Islamic State; killings are reminder of dangers to the many young Ethiopians desperate to leave for economic opportunities.
